info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 3:55PM CDT until July 05 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Will County in northeastern Illinois... Southeastern Cook County in northeastern Illinois... West central Lake County in northwestern Indiana... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 354 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sauk Village, or over Steger, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hammond, Gary, Chicago Heights, Schererville, Lansing, Highland, Munster, Park Forest, Homewood, Cedar Lake, Steger, Griffith, Dyer, St. John, Hazel Crest, Sauk Village, Flossmoor, Lynwood, Glenwood and Crete. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-80 between mile markers 2 and 6. This includes... Illiana Motor Speedway and Prairie State College. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
